law.catch_line: Minors engaging others for unlawful purpose.

text.section:
Sec. 21-11. Minors engaging others for unlawful purpose.
It shall be unlawful for any minor to engage or utilize the services of any other person, and it shall be unlawful for any person, whether for remuneration or not, to procure for such minor any article which the minor himself is forbidden by law to purchase.
